title: Her Stepbrother:
description: Chelsea is stuck in a web of love and lies, unable to choose between the two boys who have captured her heart. Kevin, her stepbrother, has a reputation for being a man whore due to his behavior. Kevin is the player you don't want to compete against. Kevin's charming words have a way of convincing you, even when your gut tells you otherwise. Her best friend, Jasonâ€™s jealousy and overbearing nature, often frustrates Chelsea, but she knows how to handle him. Whenever Jason is around, she feels a sense of calm and contentment, knowing that he loves her. Kevin is smitten with her and can't stop thinking about her. They both have an intense jealousy towards her that is hard to ignore. Someone is holding onto a dangerous secret that could shatter their entire world. Secrets are like poison; they can pick away at everything you hold dear.
author: Mikey B.
